title: Variable Setup
description: The setup and configuration of a sensor to measure a specific variable.

sensor.description: Reference to the sensor used for the variable measurement.

activatedVariable.description: The variable that the sensor is configured to measure.

activationDate.description: Date when the sensor started measuring the variable.

deactivationDate.description: Date when the sensor stopped measuring the variable.

calibrationDate.description: The last calibration date of the sensor.

nextCalibrationDate.description: The next scheduled calibration date of the sensor.
